org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports

Interface ReportSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportSettingsImpl

    public interface ReportSettings
    Stores Report Settings like currency to display, currency format, calendar type, year ranges to display and other. Any display filters (like year ranges) will affect only the columns, but not the totals. To filter the totals, please use ReportFilters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Long> buildYearSettingsPredicate() 
      CalendarConverter getCalendar()
      returns the Calendar to be used for grouping by dates, filtering by dates, etc
      java.lang.String getCurrencyCode()
      returns currency code to be used for amounts display
      java.text.DecimalFormat getCurrencyFormat()
      returns a DecimalFormat for currency display format
      AmountsUnits getUnitsOption()
      should never return null
      FilterRule getYearRangeFilter()
      returns the Year Range Setting of the report.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrencyCode

        java.lang.String getCurrencyCode()
        returns currency code to be used for amounts display

      • getCurrencyFormat

        java.text.DecimalFormat getCurrencyFormat()
        returns a DecimalFormat for currency display format

      • getUnitsOption

        AmountsUnits getUnitsOption()
        should never return null

      • getCalendar

        CalendarConverter getCalendar()
        returns the Calendar to be used for grouping by dates, filtering by dates, etc

      • getYearRangeFilter

        FilterRule getYearRangeFilter()
        returns the Year Range Setting of the report. The year numbers are in the target calendar; in case of FiscalCalendars, the number specifies the FY first year

      • buildYearSettingsPredicate

        default java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Long> buildYearSettingsPredicate()
